vote.title: Authorize a contract for the construction of the addition of a senior activity center, technology center, and gymnasium and expansion of the parking lot at Willie B. Johnson Recreation Center located at 12225 Willowdell Drive - J.C. Commercial, Inc., best value proposer of eight - Not to exceed $7,199,777.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 Bond Funds)
